alert.note: Alert for Borden; Glasscock; Howard; Lower Brewster County; Midland; Mitchell; Pecos; Reagan; Scurry; Terrell; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 14 at 8:29PM CST until January 15 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 15% OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR THE WESTERN LOW ROLLING PLAINS, SOUTHEAST PERMIAN BASIN, PECOS AND TERRELL COUNTIES, AND LOWER BREWSTER COUNTY... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 15% OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER... * AFFECTED AREA...Borden, Scurry, Howard, Mitchell, Midland, Glasscock, Upton, Reagan, Pecos, Terrell and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...Saturday afternoon through Saturday afternoon. * WINDS...North 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * RFTI...3 to 4 or near critical.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Borden; Glasscock; Howard; Lower Brewster County; Midland; Mitchell; Pecos; Reagan; Scurry; Terrell; Upton
